letters.description: Evaluate the client's energetic field and identify imbalances using Reiki techniques and intuitive assessment.
Collaboratively define clear intentions for healing and growth, aligning with the client's highest good.
Channel Reiki energy through specific hand positions and symbols to facilitate healing on physical, emotional, and spiritual levels.
Identify and gently release energetic blockages and limiting beliefs through Reiki and guided visualization.
Provide tools and guidance for integrating the healing experience into daily life, fostering self-awareness and continued well-being.
